VirtualFish !Build Statushttps://github.com/justinmayer/virtualfish/actions !PyPI Versionhttps://pypi.org/project/virtualfish/ !Downloadshttps://pypi.org/project/virtualfish/ VirtualFish is a Python virtual environmentVirtualenv manager for the Fish shell. You can get started by reading the documentationRead The Docs. Itâ€™s quite shortâ€¦ Promise! You can also get help on virtualfish on OFTC , the same network as the Fish IRC channel. VirtualFish is maintained by Justin Mayer, and was originally created by Daisy Leigh Brenecki. A quickstart, for the impatient ðŸ‘‰ Fish version 3.1 or higher is required. ðŸ‘ˆ 1. 2. 3. Add VirtualFish to your prompt 4. Read the documentationRead The Docs to find out more about project management, environment variable automation, auto-activation, and other plugins, as well as extending VirtualFish with events, virtualenvwrapper emulation, and more. Virtualenv: https://virtualenv.pypa.io/en/latest/ Fish shell: https://fishshell.com/ Read The Docs: https://virtualfish.readthedocs.org/en/latest/ virtualenvwrapper: https://bitbucket.org/virtualenvwrapper/virtualenvwrapper
